languages.text:
This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.
languages.original_text:
Этот предмет повышает {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} владельца {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знание: Ксеносы{/g} на 10.
Если носитель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — сторонник, вместо этого все его навыки повышаются на 10.

traits.locale_text:
This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has Benevolentia — Adherent, it increases all skills by +10 instead.

This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has Benevolentia — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.

This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.

languages.text:
Этот предмет повышает {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} владельца {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знание: Ксеносы{/g} на 10.
Если носитель обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — сторонник, вместо этого все его навыки повышаются на 10.

装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——拥护者，则改为所有{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}提高10点。
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}。
如果装备者拥有信条“人道主义——拥护者”，则改为所有{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}提高10点。

languages.text:
このアイテムは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}を+10上げる。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 門下生を持っていれば、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}が+10上がる。
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.

traits.locale_text:
自身の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}+10
自身がベネボレンティア ― 門下生を所持している場合、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}が+10上昇。

languages.text:
Este objeto aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g} del portador en +10.
Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Partidario, en vez de eso aumenta todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} en +10.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.

traits.locale_text:
Este objeto aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g} del portador en +10.
Si el portador tiene Benevolentia: Partidario, en vez de eso aumenta todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} en +10.

languages.text:
Dieser Gegenstand erhöht das {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g} des Trägers um +10.
Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ketzer{/g} – Anhänger, erhöht er stattdessen alle {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} um +10.
languages.original_text:
This item increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} by +10.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent, it increases all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} by +10 instead.

traits.locale_text:
Dieser Gegenstand erhöht das {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g} des Trägers um +10.
Hat der Träger Benevolentia – Anhänger, erhöht er stattdessen alle {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} um +10.

languages.text:
Cet objet confère un bonus de +10 à la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g} de l'utilisateur.
Si l'utilisateur dispose de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Partisan, il obtient à la place un bonus de +10 sur toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g}.
